channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Gosport to create a wildlife-friendly garden with a theatrical twist for drama-loving Nicola and David.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Flipping Profit
channel.desc: An antiques expert, a market trader and an upcycler battle it out to make the most money. Kate Bliss, Linda Lambert and Anthony Devine are in Monmouth.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Two archaeologists and a historian try Edwardian life for a year. They prepare for the arrival of their first livestock, and historian Ruth Goodman cooks a sheep's head stew.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Archaeologists Alex and Peter and historian Ruth try Edwardian life for a year. The team branch out into market gardening, all-year-round egg production and beef cattle.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Archaeologists Alex and Peter and historian Ruth try Edwardian life for a year. The team get to grips with the revolutionary technologies of the age.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Archaeologists Alex and Peter and historian Ruth try Edwardian life for a year. The team leave the farm in search of work and head to the coast to reap the ocean's bounty.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Archaeologists Alex and Peter and historian Ruth try Edwardian life for a year. Alex and Peter go down a copper mine, just a few hundred yards from their cottage.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Queer Lives Today
channel.desc: Shiva Raichandani's film follows Asifa as she prepares to undergo gender affirmation surgery. The trans activist reflects on how her life has changed during her transition.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Magnificent Seven Deadly Sins
channel.desc: Bawdy seventies sketch comedy film starring a bevy of British talent from Bruce Forsyth and Harry Secombe to Joan Simms and June Whitfield. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Intimate Games
channel.desc: A psychology teacher instructs his university class to write down their sexual fantasies. The students then take their chance to make these desires a reality. Contains nudity and 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Au Pair Girls
channel.desc: Seventies film following the misadventures of four female au pairs who arrive at Heathrow Airport and are whisked off to work for different families. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Die Screaming Marianne
channel.desc: Marianne, a nightclub dancer, is on the run from vicious criminals. Trickery and betrayal are around every corner in this suspense-filled thriller. Susan George stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Swinging London Session Musicians
channel.desc: A history of London's Session Musicians, sharing their memories and experiences from the 50s and 60s onwards across the musical spectrum, from rock and pop to reggae and classical.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Aylesbury to create a Thai-inspired garden for Justin and Linda, with a relaxing space for remembrance.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Right To Roam
channel.desc: The story of the people who have struggled for the right to roam in England - from the mass trespass on Kinder Scout in 1932 to the great Dartmoor Gathering of 2023.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Richard Wilson's Highland Fling
channel.desc: Richard returns to Scotland to embark on tour of the Highlands and Islands. The journey offers him the opportunity to discover more about his homeland and reflect on his life.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Alan Cumming's Edge of Scotland
channel.desc: Scottish-born actor Alan Cumming explores the picturesque Outer Hebrides of Scotland, touring the Western Isles from Barra to Stornoway on Lewis, Eriskay and the Callanish stones.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Futtock's End
channel.desc: Ronnie Barker stars as General Futtock, who has a motley group of guests stay at his country estate - and chaos ensues. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: What's Good For The Goose
channel.desc: Comedy. Norman Wisdom stars as a bank manager who upends his square existence to join some youthful hippies. Will this new groovy energy bring the spark back to his marriage.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Magnificent Seven Deadly Sins
channel.desc: Bawdy seventies sketch comedy film starring a bevy of British talent from Bruce Forsyth and Harry Secombe to Joan Simms and June Whitfield. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Stick Up
channel.desc: In this period caper, set in 1930s England, romance blooms between two very different people, an American thief and an Irish woman.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Let's Get Laid
channel.desc: Gordon Laid is a soldier returning to London after WW2. He gets mixed up in a series of murders and mistaken identities. Bawdy romp with Robin Askwith. Contains nudity and 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Groupie Girl
channel.desc: Sally runs away from her strict upbringing to become a rock band's groupie. A cautionary tale of hairy hippies and heartbreak. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Doomwatch
channel.desc: Scientists investigate a remote island plagued by mutations caused by toxic waste, uncovering a disturbing government cover-up.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Weekend Millionaires
channel.desc: An oral history of Britain's most famous river; focusing on the Lightermen and Watermen who have worked on the Thames from the 1960s to today.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: LumoTV
channel.desc: Six members of the Deaf community recall the fear that gripped Britain during the Covid-19 crisis, and give us aninsight into how the pandemic and lockdown affected their lives.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Queer Lives Today
channel.desc: Tom Gaisford's film follows a gay trans man stepping into the ring for a boxing fight. This knockout documentary gives you a ringside seat to a situation gaining notoriety.

channel.desc: A raw documentary following the Great Britain Deaf Women's Futsal team as they strive to win a medal at the Winter Deaflympics.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Strip Poker
channel.desc: Man-about-town John Carter is implicated in the murder of a woman from a nightclub. With gangsters strong-arming him, can he escape from seedy Soho? Contains nudity and 60s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Mary Millington
channel.desc: Two hapless forgers hide out in a Scottish manor house. When a troupe of dancing girls join them musical numbers, comedy and sauce ensues. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.title: Black Beauty
channel.desc: Faithful version of classic children's tale featuring the adventures of spirited horse Black Beauty. Can her young owner get her back? Mark Lester - of Oliver! fame - stars.

channel.title: Man Down
channel.desc: Stories from men working in the music industry and the toll it has taken on their mental health and wellbeing. Featuring Rag'n'Bone Man, Dev IDLES and Geoff Barrow from Portishead.
